title: Help
subtitle: Answers to common questions and support

howToLog.q: How do I log a workout?
howToLog.a: Click the 'Add Exercise' button or go to the Workouts section.

howToTrack.q: How do I track my progress?
howToTrack.a: Check the Analytics and Dashboard sections for detailed statistics.

units.q: How do I change weight units?
units.a: Go to Settings > Units of Measurement.

sync.a: All data automatically syncs to the cloud when you have an internet connection.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Need help? We're here to assist.
